title: Delegation of Authority Under Section 614(a)(2) of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961
summary: This presidential memorandum, dated December 26, 2025, delegates authority to the Secretary of State to determine if selling up to $25.9 million in cluster munitions technology to the Republic of Korea is vital to U.S. national security interests. This delegation is made under Section 614(a)(2) of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961, allowing the sale without regard to other provisions of law, provided Section 614(a)(3) requirements are met.
